Quantity: 25 units
Unit Price: $45.50
Total: $1,137.50
Description: Industrial-grade valve controller with automatic failsafe.
It's designed for high-pressure applications up to 3000 PSI.

Quantity: 15 units  
Unit Price: $89.99
Total: $1,349.85
Description: Digital ﬂow sensor with real-time monitoring capability.
Provides accurate measurements within 0.1% tolerance.

Total: $637.50

The kit includes O-rings, washers, and sealant compound.
